verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of David. Jehovah<WH3068>, my heart<WH3820> is not haughty<WH1361>, nor mine eyes<WH5869> lofty<WH7311>; Neither do I exercise<WH1980> myself in great matters<WH1419>, Or in things too wonderful for me<WH6381>.
Surely I have stilled<WH7737> and quieted<WH1826> my soul<WH5315>; Like a weaned<WH1580> child with his mother<WH517>, Like a weaned child<WH1580> is my soul within me<WH5315>.
O Israel<WH3478>, hope<WH3176> in Jehovah<WH3068> From this time forth and for<WH5704> evermore<WH5769>.
